name: Mafia Online: Wild West
storyline:
Mafia Online: Wild West is a saloon team psychological turn-based role-playing game with a detective plot. The rules are close to the classic ones, but the Wild West dictates its own laws ...
The investigation will be carried over to the days of the Wild West. Wild West bandits commit murder every night. Civilians try to save the townspeople, find out at the day's discussion who among the visitors of the tavern is a bloodthirsty killer pretending to be Peaceful, and execute him. It remains to determine who, indeed, is Peaceful, and who is a cruel killer, cleverly pretending. The main thing is not to miss!
Other users are playing against you. Depending on your role, you need to either find out who among the players is an excellent pretender-Bandit, who committed murder at night, and who is a real Peaceful, defending his city, and execute the guilty, or commit murders, pretend to be the most honest and kind during the day, and stay as long as possible live.
You can communicate with players using the camera, microphone and chat.
You can play with your company, create password-protected servers where you can invite your friends.
You create your own character: a man or a woman, set parameters for him, choose eye color, hairstyle, clothes, and more. Roles can be purchased and selected before searching for a game, you will get one of them at random. And, of course, how can it be without duels in the Wild West. Buy cartridges and be in all weapons!
If you have an account in the Mafia Online mobile application, enter your nickname and password when registering, and you will receive prizes
